publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-3653 Pauline McNeill: 200th Anniversary of Birth of Thomas Graham—That the Parliament celebrates the 200th anniversary of the birth of Thomas Graham, a Glaswegian and the father of chemistry in Scotland who was the first Professor of Chemistry at Anderson’s College which is now part of the University of Strathclyde, founded the Chemical Society of London and was the Master of the Mint, an important figure in HM Treasury, and considers that it is particularly important to celebrate this anniversary whilst the Scottish Executive is encouraging more students to study and graduate in science and to become science teachers.

S2M-3653 Pauline McNeill: 200th Anniversary of Birth of Thomas Graham—That the Parliament celebrates the 200th anniversary of the birth of Thomas Graham, a Glaswegian and the father of chemistry in Scotland who was the first Professor of Chemistry at Anderson’s College which is now part of the University of Strathclyde, founded the Chemical Society of London and was the Master of the Mint, an important figure in HM Treasury, and considers that it is particularly important to celebrate this anniversary whilst the Scottish Executive is encouraging more students to study and graduate in science and to become science teachers. Supported by: Mr Kenneth Macintosh*, Mr David Davidson*, Jackie Baillie*, Sarah Boyack*, Bill Butler*, Ms Rosemary Byrne*, Bruce Crawford*, Karen Gillon*, Christine Grahame*, Patrick Harvie*, Fiona Hyslop*, Dr Sylvia Jackson*, Christine May*, Mr Alasdair Morrison*, Bristow Muldoon*, Dr Elaine Murray*, Nora Radcliffe*, Eleanor Scott*, Robin Harper*, Mr John Swinney*, Mr Frank McAveety*, Karen Whitefield*, Dr Jean Turner*, Helen Eadie*, Ms Wendy Alexander*, Tommy Sheridan*, Ms Sandra White*
S2M-3653 200th Anniversary of Birth of Thomas Graham (lodged on 29 November 2005) Mr Brian Monteith*
S2M-3653 200th Anniversary of Birth of Thomas Graham (lodged on 29 November 2005) Donald Gorrie*
S2M-3653 200th Anniversary of Birth of Thomas Graham (lodged on 29 November 2005) Linda Fabiani*
S2M-3653 200th Anniversary of Birth of Thomas Graham (lodged on 29 November 2005) Mr Jamie Stone*
S2M-3653 200th Anniversary of Birth of Thomas Graham (lodged on 29 November 2005) Maureen Macmillan*
S2M-3653 200th Anniversary of Birth of Thomas Graham (lodged on 29 November 2005) Elaine Smith*
